title: #294 - Carl Cohen, Animal Rights
itunes:title: #294 - Carl Cohen, Animal Rights
description: Attention contrarians, here's an episode for you. This week, Connor and Dan discuss American philosopher Carl Cohen who isn't afraid to piss people off with his thoughts on controversial issues, including animal rights. This is an episode for all you devil's advocates out there or for any vegetarians looking to hone their debate skills.
